channel.title: Making a pk point system
channel.description: Hello everyone I would like for someone to tell me how to make a pking/pvping system to where i can make a shop with pvp armours and u need pking points(from killing players) in order to get the items. I don't know how to add the pvp system. so i would like some help.. if you could just give me a tut or a brief description on the topic. thanks.
